name: google-tasks-mcp-server-extension
description: The Google Tasks MCP server offers a comprehensive set of tools for managing tasklists and tasks within a user's Google Tasks account.

tools.name: list_tasklists
tools.description: List available tasklists from user's Google Tasks account.

tools.name: create_tasklist
tools.description: Create a new tasklist in user's Google Tasks account.

tools.name: get_tasklist
tools.description: Retrieve details of a specific tasklist.

tools.name: update_tasklist
tools.description: Update the metadata of a specific tasklist.

tools.name: clear_tasklist
tools.description: Clear all completed tasks from a specific tasklist.

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List all tasks from a specific tasklist

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task inside a specified tasklist.

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Retrieve details of a specific task.

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update specific fields of an existing task.

tools.name: move_task
tools.description: Move a task within a tasklist or to another tasklist.

tools.name: delete_task
tools.description: Delete a specific task from a tasklist.

oauth_credentials.title: Google OAuth 2.0 Credentials
oauth_credentials.description: Path to the credentials.json file downloaded from the Google Cloud Console for OAuth 2.0 authentication.
